title: 49ers-Cardinals TNF Preview, Is San Francisco's defense better than New England's? (Football 10/31)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Jared Dubin to preview 49ers-Cardinals on Thursday Night Football. The guys discuss the potential for this to be a trap game (6:00), and if they can win a Super Bowl with Jimmy Garoppolo playing at his current level (8:15). Will and Jared also analyze just how good the San Francisco defense has been (21:00) and what Kyler Murray and Kliff Kingsbury must devise to try to crack it (26:30). Finally, player props and a game pick (35:45).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
